text: Agildo Ribiero (April 24, 1932 â€“ April 28, 2018) was a Brazilian actor. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He was known for his role in the 1959 movie Three Loves in Rio. Ribeiro died in Rio de Janeiro on April 28, 2018 of heart failure at the age of 86.Agildo Ribeiro morre aos 86 anos no Rio de Janeiro ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
